name: Diskriter
description:
We are a business conglomerate, headquartered in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. Our history dates back to 1947 when we established one of the earliest health care services platform in the country. Since then, we have diversified into several business verticals, process, and niches, serving our customers with utmost integrity and building long-term relationships based on trust & mutual respect.
Our clients include leading hospitals across the USA, healthcare providers, Fortune 500 companies, Internet businesses and digital entrepreneurs from all over the world.
Revolutionary Healthcare Services. Mission Critical Staffing Solutions. Impactful Digital Marketing, Design & Development Services.
Welcome Onboard!
